plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Tavvy uses your location to show nearby places and let you review locations around you.

plugins.cameraPermission: Tavvy uses the camera so you can add photos to reviews and places.

plugins.photosPermission: Tavvy allows you to select photos to add to reviews and experiences.
plugins.cameraPermission: Tavvy uses the camera so you can add photos to reviews and places.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Tavvy uses your location to show nearby places and let you review locations around you.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Tavvy uses the camera so you can add photos to reviews and places.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Tavvy allows you to select photos to add to reviews and experiences.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Tavvy saves photos you upload with your permission.
